title: LFM MID, ADC, SUPP - D5 + (Semi-serious)
body:
Looking for members to fill the roles of support, mid, and adc. Hit me up in game or reply to this discussion,
Semi serious depending on how well we play.

Diamond 5 + only thanks!

replies.body: hey guys would love to join a good team. just started a new account. honestly trial me for a game before judging me.. am a pretty mad adc...
Mid Lane main D5 add me Seethingsin
Mid/adc/sup player here will talk to you more after you add me
Great! Sent you a request in game
I didnt get a friend request yet
i've added you, shoot me a msg when you accept and we can talk
